description: The fund is an actively-managed exchange-traded fund (“ETF”) that will invest primarily in equity securities, including common stock or American depositary receipts (“ADRs”) of companies that Spear Advisors LLC (the “Adviser”) believes are poised to benefit from breakthrough innovation in industrial technology. The Adviser defines innovations in industrial technology as those technological developments that are transforming or have the potential to transform the industrial sector. It is non-diversified.
name: Spear Alpha ETF
